subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy shot a final-round 66 to beat the 54-hole leader Sergio García, who had a 71, by two strokes at the Bridgestone Invitational.
snippet: Rory McIlroy shot a final-round 66 to beat the 54-hole leader Sergio García, who had a 71, by two strokes at the Bridgestone Invitational.
